title: Operational Telemetry Policy Configuration
description: Defines the sampling rates, buffering limits, and aggregation policies for generating Certified Operational Telemetry (COTS). Used to balance data fidelity, network load, and storage costs.

default_sample_rate.description: The default probability (0.0 to 1.0) of logging a telemetry point if no specific policy matches.

buffer_size_mb.description: Maximum size of the local in-memory telemetry buffer before flushing to the persistence layer.

agent_specific_policies.description: Overrides for specific agents that require higher fidelity tracking or lower overhead.

agent_source_pattern.description: Regex pattern matching the target COTS agent_source (e.g., SGS-.* or RQL-Cache).

sampling_probability.description: The specific sampling probability for matched agents.
